website_summaries.verdict: This retro-style buffet table offers amazing value for money. Plenty of storage for dinnerware, bottles, and accessories.
pros: This buffet table will accommodate all your dining room needs
Includes three spacious cabinets, cutlery drawer, and eight-bottle wine rack
cons: Users report the shipping packaging could be more protective, having received damaged parts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and width.
customer_reviews.text: Love my new buffet! The color is nice, dark brown and the size perfect to hold some basics, but not too large to feel overwhelming. Putting it together was pretty easy, it's a two-person job and instructions were easy to follow. Only issue was the width of wine bottle holder. The size holds standard wine bottles, but not a fuller bottle like champagne or bottles from our wine club :( Overall pretty satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: L. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Was not prepared for the mental anguish of assembling this thing
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, now that it’s over with, it looks pretty nice. However had I known how awful the assembly process was I would not have ordered this. Bear in mind that I’m pretty good with my hands, even so this thing was more of a logic puzzle that turned into a piece of furniture once completed. None of the components were labeled, screws were stripped and dowel pins were missing. I was still able to make it work, but it’s not the sturdiest piece of furniture in my house. Still looks cool, but would definitely not recommend and personally will not order something from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: fflando

customer_reviews.title: Winsome Diego Buffet Side-table
customer_reviews.text: Don't do it. Don't waste your time. Two returns of damaged and destroyed items so far, and now a full refund. The packaging on these boxes is a joke. You can see for your self in the pictures and video I've posted exactly how low-grade and horrible this companies effort are. From what I could tell of the pieces I've seen and held, it looks like it would have been a nice buffet/side-table. Too bad I'll never know. Happy for those that got lucky and had theirs delivered in good condition. Just wish the company would have put more effort in packaging for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: FBW

customer_reviews.title: Good piece for the price
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. It looks great and I don't regret purchasing it. However, you should expect low quality when it arrives. One piece was cracked(easily mended), another was cracked and had obviously been mended by the manufacturer. If this were completely real wood I'd expect the cost would be closer to $1000-$1500. Like I said, you get what you pay for. It looks really nice in my dinning room and I was able to cover up the scratch easily. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JDunn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bar Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Bar Cabinet , shipped on time and arrived without damage. Assembling was easier than Ikea products and was without any problems. Most importantly the quality of wood and cabinets very good for price range. Sturdy, not flimsy and looks high emd. Wood color bright cherry and looks great once assembled. Highly recommended Great quality craftsmanship and product durability
customer_reviews.author: Pablo E

customer_reviews.title: built and appearance
customer_reviews.text: This is a very heavy, very beautiful and sturdy piece of furniture with a lot of space, I love the wood and the look very much. We have a very old beautiful house and this Furniture piece fits very well with our set up. You need to have 2 people, as the pieces are tough to put together. The instructions are ok, somewhat harder to follow, but overall a great experience and I am glad we got the item.
customer_reviews.author: Dagmar K.

customer_reviews.title: Good once assembled
customer_reviews.text: The thing is made out of pretty cheap particle board, and it is a TRICK to assemble. Nothing is really cut that precisely, so you definitely have to wrestle this thing together. I also had to cut about a centimeter off of one of the back boards in order to get it in it's slot properly. The whole time I was assembling it (which took a couple hours) I kept thinking how cheaply made it was. BUT, once it all comes together it looks pretty good and it will hold whatever you need it to hold (booze, probably). It cost about $160 so it's probably worth it if you know what you've signed up for.
customer_reviews.author: lojenx

customer_reviews.title: Biggest piece of junk ever!
customer_reviews.text: Wooden dowels too big and split the frame when trying to insert. Also too long so screwing on the middle shelf also split the frame. Middle and lower shelves are thin and cheap and arrived separated from their frames. Items also arrived with several areas of damage and one panel was assembled so poorly I couldn't even attach it because the predrilled holes wouldn't line up. Waiting for customer service to get back to me because I don't know how I'm supposed to return this.
customer_reviews.author: JonB

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this and would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Used in my breakfast area. I have a small kitchen so this provides extra storage and counter space. Perfect match with my dinette. Peices where packaged well, but nothing was labeled. I took the time to label each peice as I identified to make sure I had all the parts. This made assembly a breeze. Only downside is open side shelves aren't wide enough for my caphalone grill or crock pot. But overall just what I needed for he space
customer_reviews.author: DCL

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is by far, a very nice piece of furniture but trying to assemble the beast is what lowers its rating. I am a pro at assembling furniture and this took forever due to holes not lining up, dowels not going in without a mallet and lots of repositioning to put the furniture in the best place for maneuvering. I was exhausted after putting this together and there are still places where pieces are not flush but what can ya do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but...
customer_reviews.text: This actually looks outstanding when it's finally assembled. But assembly is difficult for one person. The dozens of parts are not labeled and they look very similar to the rudimentary instructions they give. It's almost like the instructions are reminder two people that I've already put together 10 of these. I want you figure it out I think you'll like it it looks far more expensive than it costs
customer_reviews.author: kevin andersen

customer_reviews.title: Highly suggest buying from another company.
customer_reviews.text: Save your money or kick in another 100 for a quality piece. Received on time - packaged nicely. I just unpacked it and am missing an important piece - the instructions! Hopefully they are posted on the website or somewhere. Also, I see one piece that is defected - two of the three dowels/rungs are warped pretty badly. How they let these defected parts out the building is beyond me, I guess that’s what keeps the price down. I don’t mind small or hidden defects but this ones a doozy. I chalk this up as my loss and their gain.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the effort
customer_reviews.text: This piece was a pain in the butt to assemble...but I did it solo and the directions say you need two people. Good thing it holds wine because you will probably want some after you're done. However, it's worth the effort. It looks great and will hold a lot of stuff that is currently taking up precious cupboard space. Mine came with all required parts and the parts were in great condition. UPDATE: I've had this almost two years and I still love it. It stores a lot and in a small amount of space, and looks great, too. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: don't waste your time and money
customer_reviews.text: bought this cabinet for my dining room and i was extremely disappointed. multiple shelves had scratches and one part was obviously glued back together. None of the pieces fit together correctly, the wooden dowels didn't fit in the coordinating spaces, they were either way to tight or loose where they didn't even stay and the shelves would fall apart. The directions were very vague and you were almost guessing on what pieces went where. Extremely frustrating especially because it would have went so prefect in my dining room. Unfortunately i returned it for a full refund and i won't be purchasing from this manufacturer again.
customer_reviews.author: Nichol rivera

customer_reviews.title: it is in about 35 pieces and instructions suck. I have order furniture online before and put ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a nightmare to put together. it is in about 35 pieces and instructions suck. I have order furniture online before and put it together easily because in entrusts are useful. Not with this set. The reason for the 2 star review is because the instructions suck, cabinet door broke after 1 week and the top got a scratch on it from moving a glass cup on the top of it. Try to find a better quality piece if furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Gadeer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Affordable Piece
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a bar for our open area kitchen/living room. It functions well and looks good, however, the quality could be better. One of the middle doors arrived damaged, and we didn't notice until the piece was pretty much completely assembled. However, Amazon customer service sent us a new sideboard and suggested we simply take the door from the replacement and then ship the replacement back with the damaged door.
customer_reviews.author: L.S.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This piece of furniture is actually very sturdy and good quality. I didn't have any broken pieces or defected pieces as well. I was able to build this with another person within an hour or so. The only issue was that the pieces weren't marked with a letter , but it wasn't too hard to match the pieces with the instructions. Overall it looks really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the living room
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It came with one small crack in one of the shelves but it's a real minor damage. The wood is ok and it's not hard to assemble. It says you need two people to assemble this but I managed to do it on my own without any issues. I like the color and how it sits in the living room, doesn't smell bad and it's really a nice cabinet with accent.
customer_reviews.author: ecate

customer_reviews.title: Half and half
customer_reviews.text: I should really give this 3 stars. It looks good and is functional for my needs. However, the internal pieces are thin processed wood. (About an 1/8” thick. Whether it’s able to withstand weight, we’ll see.
customer_reviews.author: Shadoew

customer_reviews.title: Not great but will do
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like this item. It's nice looking and seems to be functional, but putting it together (as other reviews said) was a nightmare. The instructions are all images, they don't label the pieces, and I think the one I received had errors in the manufacturing, and so I had to get creative a couple times with putting it together. I was so close to returning it in the midst of building it, but decided it would be fine. Not super quality, but will do. Came out to be nice and hopefully it won't fall apart on me!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Chitman

customer_reviews.title: Value for money.
customer_reviews.text: A little scuffed up, easy to put together except would have been nice to have the bits labeled with arrows and alphabet. One piece did split when screwed too far, but otherwise sturdy. Over all good for what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: solid wood top, nice color
customer_reviews.text: Product is mostly solid wood and went together in about an hour. There were 4 extra dowel, just in case. I would rate a 5/5 but the box was damaged upon receipt - actually torn open about a foot from end & the sideboard's top has slight dent. We were able to put it to the back of the unit. Overall, we got what we paid for an expected. It matches our table/chairs nicely and is sturdy. Will be adding adjustable leg slides for balancing.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Wallner

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Instructions and not all wood
customer_reviews.text: Think we received someone else's return. After putting it together I used a magic marker to cover up scratches. You get what you pay for! Going to donate it to a neighbor since taking it apart would only make me break it up knowing the work involved in putting it together. Don't buy this and waste your time! Buy one that's all wood (not cardboard), all put together and pay $200 more for an everlasting heavy coffee center. Wasted a few hours!
customer_reviews.author: Jane C.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and poor instructions
customer_reviews.text: Several scratches, marks etc. No parts were marked...we had to look at the pictures to determine how to put this together. I took pictures of the dent, scratches, gouges but the app won't let me upload them.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Smith

customer_reviews.title: Buffet/Liquor Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: The product, once together is beautiful and very functional. The packaging was damaged and it has a small scratch and dent but was in a place I could cover. I would ask to ship as a gift so they double box to avoid damage. It took me two hours to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: DDShuler

customer_reviews.title: missing pieces, instructions not very clear, and wood was chipped
customer_reviews.text: Once i finally got it together it looks good. The only thing is that the wood is chipped in places that you can see just looking at it and it came that way. There was a piece missing but didn't really need it. It was a back piece to the drawers. The instructions weren't very clear so it made it really hard to put together and took me a long time. Some of the pieces don't fit properly either i have a lot of gaps.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very nice buffet. The assembly was difficult and there are ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice buffet. The assembly was difficult and there are a few chips in the veneer if one looks up close, but overall it's a great piece.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Solid piece, but tedious to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It's a solid piece of furniture. Very sturdy. I really like that the main parts are real wood with charming imperfections. However, this is definitely a two person job. It was still tedious to put together, because the parts and tools are not labeled. We couldn't use one screw, because one hole was too big for it to catch.
customer_reviews.author: Dionne Catledge

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my home office, to set up my electric tea kettle and coffee makers and all the fixings. Its absolutely wonderful. And so versatile for when retire and down size homes. It looks great anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Maribeth McMarlin

customer_reviews.title: More than Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great unit for the $116 I paid. It looks better than anything you'd get at Ikea and costs significantly less. The assembly instructions are a little hard to understand and one of the pre-built pieces had a part that was put on wrong so I had to un-screw and re attach but it was easily done. If you want something better than this you're going to need to go to a furniture store and pay at least 3 times as much.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to assemble, but packaging is poor.
customer_reviews.text: Unit was fairly easy to assemble, took a little under 2 hours. It was missing a small panel that fits behind the drawer. It also had a chip in the top, but it's on the back side and not easily seen when pushed up against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Mishelli R. Diedrich

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the Price
customer_reviews.text: The finished product is nice for the price. This sideboard table looks great in my Kitchen. Although the veneer panels are as thin as cardboard, I do not have an issue with the integrity of the construction. The packaging says that it takes two people to assemble this. I assembled this by myself while drinking some beer.. This is a one person job. My only grievance is that some of the parts were scratched. One piece had a fairly significant chip out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price but tough assembly
customer_reviews.text: Rough assembly- tons of pieces and hard to get many to line up. Some unauthorized hammering required which resulted in some damage to the piece in order to get it to fit together. I'm an experienced assembler- dressers, desks, cabinets- always on a budget so most of my furniture came flat packed. This thing was tough. But it's very inexpensive and ultimately looks good and is functional.
customer_reviews.author: M N

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this buffet!!! It works perfectly in my kitchen! I'm taking off 1 star, because it wasn't all that easy to put together. The parts aren't labeled and the pictures are confusing. With that being said, once we figured it out the buffet was exactly what I had been looking for and feels nice and solid.
customer_reviews.author: Megan E Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Piece of Furniture
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece of furniture. For the price it is great! Company sent it right away. Really do like it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebe

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the price. The instructions are vague and annoying, one part the screws required to secure something ripped the wood with one turn. If it wants for the COVID 19 social distancing, I would have returned it. I final got it together and secure, and while it looks ok, would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: PJASC

customer_reviews.title: Solid starter piece!
customer_reviews.text: A sturdy piece of furniture that's versatile to use in many spaces. Only qualm I have is the parts/fit could be a little more symmetrical. Great as a starter piece of furniture that could be easily resold when you upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the space and look I was going for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the space and look I was going for! The only complaint is some of the holes weren't drilled wide enough and the front doors are a little crooked. It is a sturdy piece, tho, and only took 1.5 hours to put together myself. Great price- worth it!
customer_reviews.author: beper

customer_reviews.title: Nice but requires patience to assemble...
customer_reviews.text: Before I start I would like to say that the end product is very nice and sturdy. However, the assembly instructions are a series of poorly drawn diagrams and its hard to identify similar looking parts. Some of the holes didn't line up properly and the manufacturer forgot to drill a couple of them... some of the mdf panels had to be trimmed to fit.. overall after 2 hours of assembly time it looks good and is a nice sideboard for our dining room...
customer_reviews.author: charles waggoner

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s really cute. I had trouble assembling the cabinet. A lot of the holes were off but in the end it came out okay.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: Looks good after installation. The table feels sturdy. The installation process is not that great. Took us awhile to get it done. Some pieces didn't fit together that good. One of the drawer surface got a spot where the skin layer got peeled. Luckily it was the button of the drawer so no one can see it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: The quality is not the best but it looks good after all
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived on time. The assembling process was challenging, specially because the parts are not labeled. The quality is not the best but it looks good after all.
customer_reviews.author: Ivette Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty table, husband put it together by the time I got home from work. Holds wine bottles, but could hold just about anything you wanted. It is not deep, which is what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Heavenly

customer_reviews.title: The Buffet looks pretty much like the photo
customer_reviews.text: The Buffet looks pretty much like the photo, and for the money, I am very pleased. I consider myself an "Ikea Queen" in terms of putting together furniture, so I was able to put it together in a bit under 2 hours. However, the instructions leave a bit to be desired. The instructions refer to each piece by a letter, but none of the pieces are labeled!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price
customer_reviews.text: There was a broken part in it, for which I had to order a replacement. It took a week more for the replacement part to arrive but once it arrived I have put it together in about 2 hours. There are some finish defects visible in the front. Overall it was OK for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Evgeni

customer_reviews.title: Double Thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.text: For the $$$, it is great. It went together well and I love the color/quality for $. My husband was sweet and put it together for me. He said it went together well and he would be a pretty tough critic on that end. He also loves it-so a double thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: M. Waters

customer_reviews.title: Ugh!
customer_reviews.text: This was my third try on an item like this and this too came with chips and parts that weren't stained. I don't know how I will find if it worth the money but this is my third attempt to get one that isn't chipped or damaged so I will see how it looks put together...stay tuned
customer_reviews.author: auralia

customer_reviews.title: Good material and good table.
customer_reviews.text: Looks soooo pretty but let me tell you its a pain to put this together...thats the only reason I gave 4 stars..but its a beautiful buffet table.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Nieves

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting cheap, build it yourself particleboard furniture but this piece is way flimsier than anything you would buy at ikea, Walmart, target, etc. It was easy to put together but doesn't seem like it will hold up at all, you could probably find something of higher quality for a similar price. It looks okay but feels very brittle and fragile, will likely be needing to replace it before too long.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great bar!
customer_reviews.text: This went together fairly easy, I did it myself. The top piece is solid and heavy! You can display the back of the buffet if you'd like. I bought this to use as a bar and installed a wine glass holder on one side. It's very solid, just the back pieces and shelf top (excluding counter top) are fake/veneer but they do look real. This was a Christmas gift... they loved it :)
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Emm

customer_reviews.title: After the corrections and covering a couple of bad corners, we decided to keep it
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were poorly written. Took a long time to assemble. The pre-drilled holes were in the wrong places. After the corrections and covering a couple of bad corners, we decided to keep it. Too much work to send it back. Thank you. AL
customer_reviews.author: Al Gribble

customer_reviews.title: Pain to put together
customer_reviews.text: Been trying to set it up for 2 hours now. Pieces don't fit in well and it's been a huge pain the whole way through. Want to just knock it over at this point and send it back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a quality piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. It went together very easily, and looks like it cost more than it does. My one complaint is that the middle storage spaces (outboard of the wine racks) are about 2 inches to short to be really useful.
customer_reviews.author: Unclemaslo

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, a few rough spots on the back corner but nothing huge. The panels and shelf have that wood grain print on them and it clashes a bit with the otherwise solid wood
customer_reviews.author: S. Morley

customer_reviews.title: and I am very pleased! It looks very nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use as a coffee bar/station in my kitchen, and I am very pleased! It looks very nice, and most of it is much sturdier than I had expected. A couple slats that fit into the back are a bit flimsy, but they weren't even necessary for my purpose. Good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Parrott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small dining area
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a small dining area, quality is great for the price. Pairs well with my expensive cherry oak dining table. Was unable to assemble myself, luckily my husband dedicated about three hours for setup. Very happy with my purchase and the price especially.
customer_reviews.author: Necheon

customer_reviews.title: Solid & compact at a good price
customer_reviews.text: The table is the right color and the correct size for the space & our function. Solidly built. The only negative is that it had 3 rough spots on the front finish. One felt like a smear of dried up glue and the other two were from the wood finish. We sanded and stained them, no big deal. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Nicklas

customer_reviews.title: We really liked it! Not too hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: We really liked it! Not too hard to assemble. Nice quality wood pieces. The fake wood pieces are in locations u don't really see. It is beautiful in our dining room!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: This piece is everything I wanted, beautiful and functional. I opt to use it in my office and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JSy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice at first but if you plan on it being a functional piece you'll be disappointed. The doors CONSTANTLY off which is very aggravating.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This was an early Christmas gift. Took my husband about an hour to put together. Came packaged well. Did have some scuffs, but nothing that can’t easily be fixed. Love that it’s a buffet and wine rack all in one!
customer_reviews.author: JCruz

customer_reviews.title: You'll be pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: This was so worth it! I absolutely love this piece of furniture and it serves it's purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Lubrano

customer_reviews.title: The product came damage and the finishing is pretty cheap. I asked to exchange and the second ...
customer_reviews.text: The product came damage and the finishing is pretty cheap. I asked to exchange and the second I had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Bazela

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I loved the photos of this item however when it arrived none of the parts were labeled and it was very difficult to assemble. Definitely a two person job. Some boards were not designed with appropriate alignment for assembly. I would not order this product again
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Tumilty

customer_reviews.title: It pains me that I gave money to this company
customer_reviews.text: Listen to the reviews. This abomination of a table isn't worth the trouble. Mine came all dented and scratched like many others. When I saw the tip-resistant accessories I knew this thing was garbage. Unfortunate that I gave such an undeserving company money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cut all wrong
customer_reviews.text: Some of the pieces were not cut properly. Got a replacement piece and that one ALSO didn't fit. May have been one in a thousand not cut right. We just decided to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Alarcon

customer_reviews.title: Good table!
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and seems to hold up for a month now but during the assembly process, table seemed a little cheap and not sturdy...will update after a few months to see how it holds up. But for the price it's a great table and my mom loves it. She's excited to use it
customer_reviews.author: zuhair

customer_reviews.title: beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Reasonable assembly, quality and heavy. Does not hold larger bottles of wine.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra D. Rose

customer_reviews.title: The good news is that once assembled it is very sturdy ...
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this unit alone and it did take a couple hours to finish. The good news is that once assembled it is very sturdy and looks like a quality piece of furniture although some parts are a little flimsy. In total a pretty good value.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Powell

customer_reviews.title: Good product, room for improvement
customer_reviews.text: Color is true to photo, easy to assemble. Unfortunately, giving 2 stars as it already had a few dings and chips in the wood which I think is unacceptable for a brand new item. Should've been packaged better.
customer_reviews.author: KenjiAnn

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: It was not as sturdy as I had hoped. Good looking and it will do the trick but it’s pretty lightweight construction.
customer_reviews.author: John Tolan

customer_reviews.title: Not difficult to assmble ...and looks great ..
customer_reviews.text: Was able to assmble it in nearly an hr all together ... although there could be more space for bottles , specially Tall bottles but its ok for the price ..quality is good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Abhi

customer_reviews.title: I'd love to replace the hinges that broke
customer_reviews.text: Assembly took long and a few parts were broken. I'd love to replace the hinges that broke. Other than that they look nice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wet bar or coffee
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a wine rack/coffee bar. My keurig and all of my coffee accessories fit on it. It came in great condition. It took my husband about 2-2.5 hours to put it together but it was not difficult for him. I am so happy with this product. It looks great and I get so many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: BriAnna Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This item is beautiful, and we are using it as a tv cabinet. It holds all the gaming consoles and remotes making it easy to get to and keep organized.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not too bad, enough to notice but then it did add ...
customer_reviews.text: This came with some markings, not too bad, enough to notice but then it did add some character to it although it was man made character, but it functions very well and I like it alot
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Handsome Piece,  However Some Pieces Are Slightly Off.  Make Sure You Pay Attention To
customer_reviews.text: The color is gorgeous. This product didn’t looked to be new and two of the doors keeps falling off due to the fit that’s slightly off. It is, however a handsome piece.
customer_reviews.author: brownglaze

customer_reviews.title: for the price it's a pretty good product so
customer_reviews.text: don't waste your money. Chips easy, fades easy and every door has fallen out . I don't even open them often!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price! Easy to install and looks great. Most of it is solid wood but some pieces could be sturdier. But can't complain for the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: onlineshopper8487

customer_reviews.title: It dose not come labeled to match the instructions. ...
customer_reviews.text: It dose not come labeled to match the instructions. Some of the back peices didnt fit flush and needed to be trimmed down.I would build it with someone who knows what they are doing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice piece!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Had an empty wall and needed something for extra storage... really amazing quality for the price and easy to put together! Package was all beat up when delivered so I was worried but all the parts were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Aria N. Ashton

customer_reviews.title: very good quality, heavy
customer_reviews.text: very good quality, heavy, thick actual wood product. Easy to put together and looks great in my kitchen as a family organizer
customer_reviews.author: Cortney

customer_reviews.title: Great server solid build easy to put together great price ...
customer_reviews.text: Great server solid build easy to put together great price only 1 piece was damaged when arrived. The review is for the table not the seller. The seller gets a 1 star
customer_reviews.author: ASIM

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest to assemble, but it looks nice, and the company replaces items (like the hinges that hold the doors on) quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coffee Bar!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. We didn't use it as a wine table, we turned it into a coffee bar! It came fast and put together extremely Well, no missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: It is a functional piece but it will likey be given away once I find a better one.
customer_reviews.text: It took us about 3 times getting this delivered without being damaged and there were still a few flaws with the one we ended up with. It is a functional piece but it will likey be given away once I find a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Soares

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking piece
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking piece, but very difficult to put together. Wrong screws. Doesn't hold well had to buy more screws to secure it. A little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's look good in my kitchen as a coffee bar table. The assembly process is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes great patience to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It's lovely once together, but I almost returned it for the difficulty I had assembling it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Baker

customer_reviews.title: Skip it
customer_reviews.text: The idea of this is great. But it came with cracks, scratches and a chunk of the corner was busted off. The color is cherry wood and doesn't match my wood table.
customer_reviews.author: Shanmf

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and easy to assemble. My husband didn't struggle too much. The color is as pictured & much lovely-er in person.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: A bit smaller than I imagined but looks great. Fit the place that needed a piece just ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit smaller than I imagined but looks great. Fit the place that needed a piece just like this...the wine rack was an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: KWS1949

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful buffet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful buffet for the price. It was a pain to put together though. None of the pieces are marked but the instructions placed a letter with each piece. It was a guessing game trying to match the piece with the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality ok, has some fake wood parts and some solid.
customer_reviews.text: Not to hard to put together. Quality ok, has some fake wood parts and some solid. Took one star off for fake wood sections.
customer_reviews.author: Non Vine & non paid reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price!! Took some extra tools to put together but definitely worth it! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product.. Very steardy and heavy. Well made.. Only bad thing is it came in tons of pieces with not very clear instructions.. Nothing was labeled. For the money its a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and beautiful! But it was not easy to put together. Make sure you have a lot of patience.
customer_reviews.author: jose bey

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was pretty simple and the product matched the picture and description.
customer_reviews.author: kabo

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece but not quality materials. You get what you pay for. Assembly was fairly easy.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Lewer

customer_reviews.title: Buffet
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice buffet. It was easily put together and seems sturdy enough. Ample storage with the 3 compartments and drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

product_meta.title: Winsome Diego Dining, Brown
feature_bullets: Featuring 2-tier wine racks allowing you to store up to 8 standard sized bottles.
